MemoryInfobox.description: 'After Kassandra killed the Spartan general Stentor, an angry Spartan spy vowed to discover the killer and take revenge.'

General_Description: '''The Real Killer''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: In the wilderness, Kassandra came face to face following the fallout of [[Stentor]]'s demise.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra found a couple of [[Sparta]]ns camping out in the wilderness, and approached them benignly.
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Spying on those [[Athens|Athenians]] is no easy task, Spartan. Anything I can do to help?''
*'''Man:''' ''You, traitor! You deserved to be killed for killing our general, Stentor of Sparta.''
<tabber>
|-|You're right.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I did kill Stentor. He left me no choice.''
*'''Man:''' ''I knew it was you! I'll do what the Spartan soldiers should have done at camp!''
(fight ensues, quest fails.)
|-|Stentor was my brother.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''The man you speak of was my brother.''
*'''Man:''' ''Oh, I had no idea. My condolences, ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]''. Maybe I confused you with someone else.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Maybe you did.''
|-|Lie - You must have the wrong person.=
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I don't know anyone named Stentor. You must be thinking of someone else.''
*'''Man:''' ''I thought I heard that the ''[[Mercenary|misthios]]'' that killed him had an [[eagle]] or something... Maybe I was wrong.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Maybe you were.''
</tabber>
*'''Man:''' ''Come to think of it... I did hear of another strange [[mercenary]] who arrived here recently. He must be the real traitor!''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''And you want me to kill this mercenary.''
*'''Man:''' ''His blood must be spilled.''
(Accept - I'll kill the mercenary.)
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll handle this.''
*'''Man:''' ''Good. Please be quick.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll come back when I'm done.''
Kassandra left the soldier and hunted down the mercenary. Afterwards, she returned to the soldier.
*'''Man:''' ''You again. Have you killed him?''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Your man is dead.''
*'''Man:''' ''Thank you, mercenary. Now, your reward.''
*'''Kassandra:''' ''Happy to help.''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra defeated the mercenary, and was rewarded for this.
Section_Trivia: *This memory seems to be triggered by the death of Stentor during [[The Conqueror]]. However, it may also be available even though Stentor is alive and well and aboard the ''[[Adrestia]]''.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
